name: ChameMan
description:
Introduction

ChameMan is a two days project for ITU OTG(İstanbul Technical University, Game Design and Development Club) FrostJam.  ChameMan is a stealth-puzzle game that can be played with a keyboard and mouse.

Developed for the PC platform with Unreal Engine 4.25.

Controls

E - Interact

Left mouse click - Move

Team

Ayça Metin - 2D Artist
Burak Akşahin - Programmer, Game Designer
Dilara Karagülle - 3D Artist, Game Designer, Level Designer
Yiğithan Albulak - Programmer, Game Designer
Şeyma Uzunoğlu - 3D Artist
